translation.en: Oh, my God. Where is it?
translation.ja: そんな…　どこだっけ？

translation.en: They're saying it could be Lily.
He asked me to give it to you.
- Anything else? - What are you busting my ass for?
translation.ja: もういい？ つれないな

translation.en: 'Cause you could get me killed, Detective.
It's on my alien registration card.
translation.ja: 名前は外国人登録証に

translation.en: But everyone calls me Lucy Fly.
What kind of camera is that?

translation.ja: レンズはズイコー　速いよ
レンズはズイコー　速いよ 興味深い

translation.en: Because that's what normal people do.
- But you are not normal. - Neither are you.
translation.ja: 君が普通？ あなたは？

translation.en: So let's not pretend to be.
Let's just be honest with each other from the beginning.
translation.ja: 社交辞令はなしで 正直に話そう

translation.en: All day long, I watch people talk, saying all kinds of things without saying what they are really thinking.
translation.ja: １日中 人を観察してるが 誰も本心を話してない

translation.en: Well, the noodles are too hot, and the broth is too salty.
translation.ja: まず このそばは熱すぎるし 汁は味が濃すぎ

translation.en: This is the strangest date I've ever been on, if it's even a date.
translation.ja: これがデートなら 奇妙すぎるし―

translation.en: I probably shouldn't trust a stranger that I've just met, and I should probably leave.
translation.ja: あなたとは初対面だから 帰ろうか迷ってる

translation.en: Now, you be honest with me.
You've already done that. What else?
Yes. Not many people have been here.
translation.ja: ああ　普段は誰も入(い)れない

translation.en: Where do you want me to stand?
What do you want me to do?
I've never had my picture taken before.
Yeah, I do. What is it?

translation.ja: さすが そう？　頑張ったよ

translation.en: - Thanks. I do my best. - Yeah?
Come and meet the new recruit.
So, she can't seem to get her bearings here. She feels like she's landed on the moon or something. So, anything you can do to help her would be great.
translation.ja: まるで月に来たって感じで 困惑してるから 助けてやれ

translation.en: Lucy, this is Lily. Lily, Lucy Fly.
translation.ja: ルーシー 彼女がリリーだ

translation.en: - Thank you, Natsuko. - It's your birthday?
translation.ja: 奈津子 誕生パーティーだったの？

translation.en: Thanks for inviting me to your birthday party.
translation.ja: 誕生パーティーだったの？

translation.en: Well, it's not really that, but you're welcome.
translation.ja: そうじゃないと思うけど

translation.en: Uh, drinks for the birthday girl. We have champagne.
translation.ja: とにかく飲め　シャンパン？

translation.en: - I'll have Sapporo, please. - Oh, me too.
translation.ja: ビールでいい 私も

translation.en: - Okay. - I'll give you a hand.
Um, so, how long have you been in Japan?
Just like three weeks now. I mean, it's been, like, totally crazy. Like, everything is so different.
translation.ja: まだ３週間だけど 何もかも違うから大変で

translation.en: - Yeah, I guess that's why we're all here. - Oh, I hear you.
translation.ja: それがクセになるの 私はＤＣがウンザリで 逃げてきた

translation.en: I'd had it with DC. I had to get out.
translation.ja: 私はＤＣがウンザリで 逃げてきた
生まれはスウェーデン

translation.en: But that was a long time ago. So I kind of see myself from here now.
translation.ja: でも国を出て かなり経つし 今は ここが故郷って感じ

translation.en: Bob said you were looking for somewhere to live.
translation.ja: 住む所を探してるって？

translation.en: Yeah, I really need to find somewhere.
I've been so stressed out about it that I've been breaking out in hives.
translation.ja: ストレスで じんましんが出た

translation.en: But I'm working at a bar right now, and my dad sent me money, so I can afford my own place.
translation.ja: バーで働いてるし 仕送りもあるけど

translation.en: But it's hard to find anywhere, especially if you don't speak the language.
I heard you speak good Japanese.
translation.ja: 日本語 うまいって？

translation.en: Oh, you're lucky, though. I wish I could.
I'm going to kill you, Bob.
We don't have anything in common. I don't wanna get stuck looking after her.
translation.ja: 共通点もない子の世話は嫌よ

translation.en: Oh, you won't. It's just... Look, she's new, so I--
translation.ja: あの子は来たばかりだから…

translation.en: Tokyo has tons of newcomers. If I took care of all of them, I wouldn't have a life of my own.
translation.ja: 東京は そういう街よ いちいち相手できない

translation.en: All right. I'm sorry I opened my big mouth.
translation.ja: おせっかいで悪かった

translation.en: So, how's it going with the guy you met?
translation.ja: 例の男と どんな感じ？

translation.en: Does he have a soy sauce face or a ketchup face?
translation.ja: しょうゆ顔？ ケチャップ顔？

translation.en: That's the way we talk about whether a Japanese person looks Eastern or Western.
translation.ja: 東洋人っぽいか 西洋人っぽいかってこと
しょうゆだと思うけど

translation.en: - What do you mean? - You know?
- In the bedroom? - We haven't done anything yet.
translation.ja: 体は？ まだ何もしてない

translation.en: - Taking it slow? - It's not up to me.
translation.ja: じっくり進めるの？ 彼次第よ
キツいですね ええ　これは振り袖よ

translation.en: It's a furisode. They’re worn on happy occasions.
translation.ja: ええ　これは振り袖よ お祝いの時に着るの
未婚の女性が 着るものですよね？

translation.en: It’s not so easy for single women in Japan.
translation.ja: 日本の独身女性は大変

translation.en: Have you ever thought of getting married?
Because of my job. You know, I'm a magistrate.
translation.ja: 私は裁判官をしてるから

translation.en: It’s a little intimidating for most men.
translation.ja: 男は怖がって逃げちゃうの

translation.en: And besides, I’m too old now.
Not in the eyes of Japanese men.
translation.ja: 日本の男はそう思わない

translation.en: Maybe I could get a widower.
Or an old one with medical problems.
translation.ja: 老人となら結婚できるかも

translation.en: But I don’t know how I'd find the time.
translation.ja: でも そんな暇もないわ

translation.en: I have my job, my friends, the string quartet.
translation.ja: 仕事もあるし 友達もいて 趣味も楽しんでる

translation.en: It’s a lot to give up to wash some old man’s diapers.
translation.ja: それを捨てて 老人の下(しも)の世話を？

translation.en: - That must be Yamamoto- san. - Hm.
I’ll go and help her with the cakes.

translation.ja: ルーシー 救急車を！

translation.en: She fell down the stairs when I greeted her. She broke her neck.
translation.ja: 私の目の前で 階段から落ちて 首を折った

translation.en: Death follows me. It always has.
translation.ja: 死が私に ついて回ってる
分かるよ いいえ　理解できるわけない

translation.en: You don't understand half of it.
translation.ja: いいえ　理解できるわけない

translation.en: You will tell me, in time.
translation.ja: なら いつか話して

translation.en: And I will tell you things about me.
translation.ja: 俺のことも教えるから

translation.en: The first time we saw each other, I knew we could be truthful.
translation.ja: 君に出会った時 心を開けると思った

translation.en: My aunt, she brought me up.
translation.ja: 俺を育てた おばだ

translation.en: After she died, I left Kagoshima and came to Tokyo.
translation.ja: おばの死後 鹿児島から上京した

translation.en: We live in the atmosphere of death.
I don't understand how anyone finds anything if none of the streets have names.
translation.ja: 通りに名前がなくて 不便じゃないの？

translation.en: I guess I'm just gonna have to learn numbers.
translation.ja: 数字だけで覚えるなんて

translation.en: Oh, I love this one! It's so Japanese.
translation.ja: 気に入った すごく日本っぽいわ

translation.en: I think I had a dream about a place like this, but in my dream it was a tree house.
translation.ja: 夢で見た ツリーハウスに似てる

translation.en: - The kitchen’s small. - I don't cook.
translation.ja: キッチンは狭い 料理しないし

translation.en: Well, I guess the only real downside is that it's an old building, so in case of an earthquake...
translation.ja: １つ難点があるとすれば 古い建物だから地震の時は…

translation.en: I don't care. I mean, it's lasted this long.
translation.ja: 今も建ってるし 平気でしょ

translation.en: Will you tell her for me?
It's weird how everyone stares at you in Japan. It's like being famous.
translation.ja: 皆にジロジロ見られて 有名人になった気分ね

translation.en: Yes. Some people get addicted to that.
He's kind of sexy, though, isn't he?
I don't see him that way. Nope.
translation.ja: まったく同意できない
契約書は問題なさそう

translation.en: I can ask one of the lawyers at Sasagawa to double- check it.
translation.ja: 事務所の弁護士にも見せる？

translation.en: Thanks. I'm so impressed you can even read that.
translation.ja: お願い　よく読めるね

translation.en: Will you order me a coffee?
You have to be able to order for yourself. How are you gonna survive if you can't ask for anything?
translation.ja: 注文もできないで どうやって生きてく気なの？

translation.en: If you want a coffee, you say, Koohii o hitotsu,
which means one, kudasai, which means please.
That's crazy that she understood that.
the Westerners arrived in 19th century Japan, they wanted to photograph the locals, but...
translation.ja: 19世紀に日本に来た西洋人が 写真を撮ろうとすると

translation.en: They thought it would steal their soul.
I think you know the answer to that question.
translation.ja: 答えは分かってるでしょ？

translation.en: What else do you have in there?
Didn't Teiji wanna come today? I've gotta meet him one of these days.
translation.ja: 禎司に会いたかったのに

translation.en: - You will. - You two getting on well?
Well, I guess we're both a bit odd, but we fit well together.
translation.ja: お互い変人だけど なぜかウマが合うのよ

translation.en: Oh, so the band's playing another gig next week. At the Downbeat Club in Ikebukuro.
translation.ja: 来週 池袋で またライブするんだ

translation.en: Yeah, these musicians, they are the best I've ever played with.
translation.ja: 過去最高の バンドメンバーだよ

translation.en: I used to have a couple of bands back in England, but, you know, there's so much negativity there.
translation.ja: イギリスの連中と違って 陰気じゃない

translation.en: I think that's what I like most about Japan. It gives you a second chance.
translation.ja: 日本は そこがいい 何度もやり直せる

translation.en: Oh, my goodness. Look at that.

translation.ja: すごくきれい 圧巻ね

translation.en: - Did anyone bring a camera? - Not me.
- What about... good morning? - Ohayo gozaimasu.

translation.ja: 相手の調子を聞く時は？

translation.en: Uh... And then if you meet someone for the first time, you just say,
translation.ja: 人と初めて会った時は…

translation.en: - I'm gonna take your shoe off. - What?
I fell on this, and Lily's playing nurse.
translation.ja: リリーが看護師のマネ事を

translation.en: I'm not playing. I used to work at George Washington Hospital. I am a nurse.
translation.ja: マネじゃない 本物の看護師よ

translation.en: Yeah, I wasn't always a bartender.
- Why don't you come in here? - I'm going to go in with Lucy.
translation.ja: こっち来いよ ルーシーと入る

translation.en: You think Teiji would like it here?
Yeah, I think so. He loves the water and...
translation.ja: ええ 彼は水が好きだしね

translation.en: I love taking photographs, but I'm not very good.
translation.ja: 写真は好きだけど下手なの

translation.en: - Does he sell his pictures? - I don't think so.
translation.ja: 作品は売ってる？ 売ってない

translation.en: Well, what does he do with them?
translation.ja: 写真は どうするの？

translation.en: I wish I could meet him.
Why don't you and I go down to the noodle shop one night?
- I don't know. - Come on, it'll be fun.
Teiji, I was wondering... why don't you do something with your photographs?
translation.ja: 禎司 どうして写真を 発表したりしないの？

translation.en: I mean, not the ones of me, of course, but...
translation.ja: 私を撮ったのは ダメだけど―

translation.en: the ones of the city. They're really good.

translation.ja: なら なぜ撮影してるの？

translation.en: - why are you taking them? - I'm collecting them.
translation.ja: なら なぜ撮影してるの？ 収集さ

translation.en: You can have an exhibition. Or put them in a book, let people see them.
translation.ja: 展示会を開くとか 写真集を出すとかしたら？

translation.en: Why does it matter to you so much?
Yes. I must get back to work.
translation.ja: そうだ　仕事に戻る
知らない　去ったんだ

translation.en: It's just that I think about you all the time, every moment.
translation.ja: あなたのことを もっと知りたかったの

translation.en: - I wanted to know more about you. - That's not the way to find out.
translation.ja: あなたのことを もっと知りたかったの 方法が間違ってる

translation.en: I just got a letter from my mom, and it took eight days to get here.
translation.ja: 母の手紙が届くまで ８日もかかった

translation.en: I called my girlfriend and we talked for, like, 20 minutes. And it cost over a hundred bucks.
translation.ja: 友達と20分 話しただけで 100ドル以上に

translation.en: I find it better not to call.
I like being cut off. It's great.
translation.ja: 関係を断ったほうが楽だし

translation.en: I'm finishing work soon. Do you wanna go somewhere?
translation.ja: もうすぐ終わるけど どこか行く？

translation.en: It's getting late. I think Lily wants to go home.
translation.ja: もう遅いし リリーを帰さなきゃ

translation.en: Are you kidding? I'd love to.
Oh, my God. He's so cute!
He's not cute. Kittens are cute.
translation.ja: 子猫とかに使う言葉よ

translation.en: Okay, whatever, he's gorgeous. And he's so tall.
I thought Japanese guys were supposed to be short.
translation.ja: 日本人なのに背が高い

translation.en: That's bullshit. That's just a stereotype.
translation.ja: それってバカな固定観念よ

translation.en: Hey! I was just in the area. - Hey! - I don't wanna bother you if Teiji's here.
translation.ja: 近くに来たの 禎司がいるなら帰るけど

translation.en: - He doesn't come here. - I brought whiskey.
translation.ja: 彼は来ない 飲もうよ
この家 すごくいいね

translation.en: It's so much nicer than mine.
- No tree, though. - No, no tree.
translation.ja: 木はないけど まあ そうね

translation.en: You don't have any pictures of Teiji anywhere.
He doesn't like having his picture taken.
It was really great meeting him the other night.
- Why do you say that? - 'Cause I can tell. I know men.
translation.ja: どこが？ 私 男には詳しいの

translation.en: I don't believe in all of that.
My personality is a combination of my genes,
translation.ja: 私の性格を決定づけるのは 遺伝子や―

translation.en: my upbringing, my parents, my school. Nothing to do with the stars.
translation.ja: 私の性格を決定づけるのは 遺伝子や― 育った環境などで 星座は関係ない

translation.en: Yeah, but I can also just tell.
Sometimes, at the bar, I have to be careful when I'm getting people's change not to look at their hands 'cause I see things.
translation.ja: バーでも客の手のひらを 極力 見ないようにしてる

translation.en: In the past, there's like a...

translation.ja: 空虚や静寂に満ちてるわ

translation.en: And then you have these three breaks in the line.
There's one early on, then another, and then a third.
What do you see about the future?
It's really complicated. I can't read it.
Well, it's like a window that opens up and then I can see things. And then it fogs up and then I can't really be sure of anything.
translation.ja: 見えたものに霧がかかり よく分からなくなる感覚なの

translation.en: - I didn't mean to freak you out. - I'm not freaked out.
translation.ja: 怖くなった？ いいえ

translation.en: - I think it stopped. - Yeah, I think it did.

translation.ja: “地震鳥(アースクエイクバード)”よ
禎司は そう呼んでる

translation.en: Just trying to wake myself up.
I had a great night's sleep.
Couldn't have been a big one. I must've slept through it.
translation.ja: 寝てて気づかなかった

translation.en: It looks like it's going to rain. Can I borrow a coat?
translation.ja: 雨かな　コート貸して
クローゼットに入ってる

translation.en: I was wondering, do you want to go to Sado Island with me?
translation.ja: 一緒に佐渡島に行かない？

translation.en: Katoh- san, my friend, she's in the string quartet.
translation.ja: 音楽仲間の地元なんだけど

translation.en: She's from there, and she says it's like time traveling into the past.
translation.ja: 過去にタイムスリップした 気分を味わえると

translation.en: It's an arts and culture festival--
Won't you be going with Teiji?
If he can get off work, yes.
I have to think about it, because Bob invited me to some concert that he's--
translation.ja: 考えさせて ボブとの予定が…

translation.en: Thank you. I'll take care of it.
let's not take any more photos today.
translation.ja: 今日は もう終わり

translation.en: - Okay. - No, I mean, we could take some more.
translation.ja: いいよ でも もう少しなら…

translation.en: Not when you don't want to.
Did you used to go out in Shinjuku with Sachi?
Natsuko, the girl I work with, she has a sister who's in a band, and they're gonna play at this club tomorrow night.
translation.ja: 同僚の奈津子のお姉さんが クラブで演奏するらしい

translation.en: Well, we never go out. We could. You know, have fun.
translation.ja: ２人で出かけたことないし 楽しもうよ

translation.en: Bob is gonna be there, and... Lily, I think.
translation.ja: ボブも来る たぶん リリーも

translation.en: - What do you think? - About what?
I don't get it. They're not really my thing.
I mean, they have an image.
Apparently, they just signed a record contract.
translation.ja: デビューするらしいしな

translation.en: So, are you and Lily dating now?
translation.ja: リリーと付き合ってる？

translation.en: Nope. She's a piece of work, that one. She sends all these signals, but she doesn't follow through.
translation.ja: いや 変な子だよ 態度がころころ変わる

translation.en: All right, so... we got off together. And fair enough, it was just once,
translation.ja: この前 ２人で いい感じになって

translation.en: but then we made a plan to go to this music festival in Nagoya this weekend.
translation.ja: 週末 名古屋に 行く約束をした

translation.en: And she just called and canceled and didn't give me any reason.
translation.ja: でもドタキャンされたよ

translation.en: When she's interested in you, you're the only one who exists. Then she moves on to someone else, and it's like you were never even there.
translation.ja: 興味が誰かに移ると 一切 相手しなくなるのさ
ビールを買ってくるよ

translation.en: - Do you want a beer? - I'll get one, mate.
translation.ja: ビールを買ってくるよ 俺がおごる

translation.en: How about you? Your first time?

translation.ja: ロマンチックじゃなかった

translation.en: I went over to see my friend at her house, but...
translation.ja: 女友達の家に 遊びに行ったんだけど―

translation.en: she wasn't there. She was at netball practice.
translation.ja: 彼女はネットボールの 練習でいなかった

translation.en: Her dad told me that he had his own
translation.ja: 彼女の父親に誘われたの

translation.en: vodka distillery in the garden shed, so we went and...
translation.ja: 自家製のウォッカが あるから―

translation.en: too happy, of course, when I told him.
translation.ja: 当然 彼は困った様子だった

translation.en: And my friend didn't show up to school.
translation.ja: その後 友達が 学校に来なくて

translation.en: It turns out that he had gone off to sea in a canoe and went too far out.
translation.ja: その後 友達が 学校に来なくて 詳しく聞いてみると 父親が海で流されたと

translation.en: The current was too strong, they said.
translation.ja: 詳しく聞いてみると 父親が海で流されたと

translation.en: He washed up a few kilometers down the shore.
translation.ja: 彼は数キロ先の岸で 見つかった

translation.en: And I found out that the baby...
translation.ja: 後で分かったんだけど―

translation.en: Do you still think about him?
- I have some cream you can use. - No. I'm good.
translation.ja: クリーム 貸すわ 平気よ

translation.en: I don't think so. I haven't seen him since Tuesday when we went to the club.
translation.ja: たぶん来ない クラブ以来 会ってなくて

translation.en: No. He's just been very busy lately,
translation.ja: 違う　彼が忙しいだけ

translation.en: and I've been working on those translations for electrical--
translation.ja: 私も翻訳の仕事が 詰まってて…

translation.en: It's probably very cold and full of sea urchins and...
translation.ja: 寒いし ウニもいるから…
だから？ 行こう ルーシー

translation.en: So, Lily, you're a nurse in America.
translation.ja: 看護師だったんだろ？ 立派な仕事だ
看護師だったんだろ？ 立派な仕事だ 病院が恋しいかも バーは大変よ

translation.en: I mean, I do miss the hospital, and the bar is really hard.
translation.ja: 病院が恋しいかも バーは大変よ

translation.en: I think it's a good kind of work, like the noodle shop.
translation.ja: でも考え事ができるだろ？

translation.en: It gives me all the time I need for thinking. Because my body just gets on with the job by itself.
translation.ja: そば屋も同じさ 仕事は頭を使わずできる

translation.en: Yeah. I'm really bad at bartending, though. Sometimes I think the customers are gonna start jumping over the counter and serving themselves.
translation.ja: でも お酒作りが下手すぎて いつか客に仕事を奪われそう

translation.en: At least now you're not around death every day.
I mean, that's part of the job.
translation.ja: 看護師に死は付き物よ

translation.en: Well, I'd say that there were three times that I saved somebody's life,
translation.ja: 私は仕事中に 三度 人の命を救った

translation.en: so I like to think about that rather than... death.
translation.ja: 死より そっちの記憶が大事よ

translation.en: I just really like the color. You don't mind, do you?
translation.ja: 色が好きなの　替わって

translation.en: Teiji can sleep here, and you can sleep here next to me.
translation.ja: あなたと禎司で私を挟んで

translation.en: This is a traditional Japanese breakfast.
I think I’d prefer some traditional Japanese cornflakes.
translation.ja: コーンフレークのほうがいい

translation.en: I heard about this, um, gold mine in Aikawa.
translation.ja: 相川に金山があるそうよ

translation.en: It could be fun to go visit.
Apparently, they have these animatronic mannequins that kind of show how the miners used to work.
translation.ja: マネキンが動いて 当時の仕事を再現するらしい

translation.en: I'd kind of rather see the coast and the cliffs at Senkaku.
translation.ja: 私は尖閣湾が見たいな

translation.en: Well, how about we go and do both?
We'll go to the cliffs in the morning, and then we'll go and cool off in the gold mine in the afternoon.
translation.ja: 朝 湾に行き 午後は金山の中で涼むの

translation.en: I can't believe you just did that.

translation.ja: おいしいし 栄養満点よ

translation.en: Hold on, sit down. Sit down. Sit down.
You're running a temperature. I'm going to lay you down, okay?
translation.ja: 熱がある　横になって

translation.en: - No. - Hey, you're okay. I'm going to lay you down.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　横になるの
気分が… 分かってる　楽にして

translation.en: Just try and lay down. It's okay.
translation.ja: 分かってる　楽にして ほら 頭も下ろすのよ
ほら 頭も下ろすのよ
ルーシー 来たのね

translation.en: You left me on a fucking cliff top.

translation.ja: 返すわ ありがとう

translation.en: - Did you get our note? - Note?
Yeah. We left you a note under a rock, by the shirt, saying we were coming here, and if you didn't come here, we'd come back for you.
translation.ja: “金山で待つ 来なければ迎えに行く”と

translation.en: No, I didn't see a note just lying around.
translation.ja: メモなんて見てないわよ

translation.en: - Oh. Well, it must've blown away. - Right.
Yeah, maybe. Maybe we're all just gonna blow away off the edge of the world.
translation.ja: 皆 世界の果てまで 飛ばされるのかも

translation.en: You might have a virus, or it could be that fish eye you had for breakfast.
translation.ja: 魚の目がよくなかったのかも

translation.en: I've got pills at the hotel. Why don't we go back?
- I don't need your pills. - I'm just trying to help.
translation.ja: 結構よ 心配なだけ

translation.en: - Lucy, you're not making any sense. - I know what I'm feeling.
translation.ja: 支離滅裂よ 分かってるわ

translation.en: And what I'm feeling isn't right. It's not right at all.
translation.ja: 今 感じてる不安は本物よ

translation.en: It's like nature is taking it back.
I need to talk to you.
- Are you sick? - I'm not feeling very well.
translation.ja: 病気なの？ 調子が悪くて

translation.en: I'll be fine in a day or two.
Is there something you need to talk about?
Well, what should I tell them at work?
You can tell them anything. I'm quitting.
translation.ja: 何とでも　どうせ辞めるし

translation.en: Quitting? Lucy, what are you talking about?
translation.ja: 辞めるって どういうこと？

translation.en: I know I fucked up and I'm sorry.
I don't know. Kind of. It's kind of driving me crazy, you know?
translation.ja: そんな感じかも それで混乱してる

translation.en: I invited you to Sado Island. I was the one who introduced you in the first place.
translation.ja: 彼に会わせ 旅行に誘ったのは私なのよ

translation.en: I know you're angry, and this isn't an excuse,
but maybe there's a bigger reason for all of this that...
translation.ja: でも 何かに 導かれてる気がするの

translation.en: - that we don't understand. - Well, did you see it in my palm?
translation.ja: でも 何かに 導かれてる気がするの 手相に出てた？

translation.en: Did you dream it was meant to be?
He was the only person who ever really saw who I was!
translation.ja: 彼だけが私を理解してくれた

translation.en: I'm sorry, Lucy. Okay? I'm sorry! But can I please come in?
translation.ja: だから謝ってるじゃない 頼むから中に入れて

translation.en: I feel like something really bad is gonna happen.
translation.ja: 悪いことが起きそうだわ

translation.en: I've been waiting for you for two days.
translation.ja: ここで２日間 待ってた

translation.en: I knew I had to come here, that you would understand.
translation.ja: 来る必要があってね 分かるだろ？

translation.en: I was at the police station.

translation.ja: なら まだ希望はあるな

translation.en: We can go away from here, to the north.
translation.ja: 一緒に遠くへ行こう 北の北海道か―

translation.en: Hokkaido. Or the south, to Kyushu.
translation.ja: 北の北海道か― 南の九州か

translation.en: I just made some onigiri. Would you like some?
translation.ja: おにぎりを作ったの 食べない？

translation.en: It was my mistake to move in here.
She came to my... door that night, Lily.
translation.ja: あの夜 リリーが 訪ねてきたんです

translation.en: She asked me if she could come in.
translation.ja: 家に入りたいと言われ―
断った やめて あなたのせいじゃない
やめて あなたのせいじゃない
だけど言い換えれば リリーは あなたを―

translation.en: There were others, too. My brother...
translation.ja: 彼女だけじゃなく 兄や―
友達の父親や山本さんも

translation.en: I can hardly walk up the stairs without seeing her face.
translation.ja: 階段を上るたびに 顔が浮かびます

translation.en: I had waxed the steps two days before.
translation.ja: あの２日前に ワックスをかけたの

translation.en: I only do it once every two years.
I was worried they were a little slippery.
translation.ja: 直後は滑るから心配してたの

translation.en: I talked to Yamamoto- san earlier that day.
translation.ja: あの日 山本さんと 電話した時―

translation.en: But... I only remembered once I'd hung up.
translation.ja: でも言うのを忘れたまま 切ったの
足袋を履いてるから 注意すべきだったのに

translation.en: would you say it was my fault?
translation.ja: 彼女の死は 私の責任なのかしら？
